application configuration properties

properties.label: Access key id
properties.description: API access key id

properties.label: Install KubeSphere
properties.description: Whether to install kubesphere

properties.label: Extra Modules
properties.description: extra modules to install with KubeSphere

properties.label: KubeSphere Dashboard EIP ID
properties.description: IP id for exposing KubeSphere Dashboard. If not installed KubeSphere, Shall not set this field.

properties.label: K8s apiserver EIP
properties.description: EIP ID for exposing kube-apiserver; if set, we'll create an LB and associate this EIP to it

properties.label: Kubernetes EIP Address
properties.description: EIP address for accessing remote Kubernetes cluster, using Dotted Decimal Notation. For example: 139.198.123.23

properties.label: Kubernetes EIP Port
properties.description: External port for accessing remote Kubernetes cluster, default value 6443

properties.label: Legible K8s Node Names
properties.description: Using legible node names, e.g. master1, worker-p001, worker-s002, instead of the default random generated ones

properties.label: Proxy Mode
properties.description: Choose a proxy mode

properties.label: network plugin
properties.description: Choose a network plugin

properties.label: hostnic maxNic
properties.description: hostnic max nics per host

properties.label: hostnic vxnets
properties.description: hostnic vxnets, one vxnet per line

properties.label: hostnic hairpin
properties.description: setting hairpin to true to forward pod traffic on the same virtual machine to physical machine; default to false, indicating pod traffic of the same virtual machine will not be forwarded to physical machines

properties.label: host aliases
properties.description: Set host aliases

properties.label: registry-mirrors
properties.description: The Docker hub registry mirrors, use a blank to split multi registry mirrors

properties.label: insecure-registries
properties.description: The insecure Docker registry, use a blank to split multi registry

properties.label: IP address and netmask for Docker bridge network
properties.description: IP address and netmask for Docker bridge network, using standard CIDR notation. For example: 192.168.1.5/24

properties.label: Docker prune days
properties.description: Keep Docker for x days, 0 indicates that the log is not cleared

properties.label: Pod Subnet
properties.description: Pod Subnet, using standard CIDR notation. For example: 10.10.0.0/16

properties.label: Service Subnet
properties.description: Service Subnet, using standard CIDR notation. For example: 10.96.0.0/16

properties.label: DNS Domain
properties.description: the dns domain used by k8s services

properties.label: Port range of each node
properties.description: A port range to reserve for services with NodePort visibility. Example: '30000-32767'. Inclusive at both ends of the range, it is important to include 30880 port when `Install KubeSphere` is `true`.

properties.label: max-pods
properties.description: Number of Pods that can run on each working node/kubelet

properties.label: Kubernetes log level
properties.description: The log level for Kubernetes system

properties.label: Keep log days
properties.description: Keep log on log node for x days, 0 indicates that the log is not cleared. This is a KubeSphere parameter

properties.label: audit-policy
properties.description: K8s audit policy in YAML format; if it is empty, no events are logged

properties.label: audit-webhook
properties.description: K8s audit webhook configurations in YAML format; if it is empty, events will be logged into files under /etc/kubernetes/audit/logs/

properties.label: audit-log-maxage
properties.description: Defined the maximum number of days to retain old audit log files

properties.label: audit-log-maxsize
properties.description: the maximum size in megabytes of the audit log file before it gets rotated

properties.label: audit-log-maxbackup
properties.description: the maximum number of audit log files to retain
